SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This is the entity of player. It should have a unique name, a color for the pin and a counter of points. It has also a hashmap for tracking resources. For the game, it has the rootCard(the starting card) and secretObjective. At the start phase, the game master should set rootCard, SecretObjective and the hand of the player(a fixed array of 3 cards). At the beginning of the game, the game master set rootCard, secretObjective and the hand.
See Also:

      public void setRootCard(PlayedCard rootCard)
      setter of the root of the player. The game master should pass the front or back of the card, chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      rootCard - the front or back of the card, chosen by the player. It's the starting card.

    • setSecretObjective

      public void setSecretObjective(ObjectiveCard secretObjective)
      It is the setter of secret objective card, which will randomly be given by the game master
      Parameters:
      secretObjective - the secret objective, that gives extra points at the ending of the game

      Parameters:

    • addResource

      public void addResource(Sign sign, Integer numResources)
      this function updates the resources given by a new card put on table
      Parameters:
      sign - the type of resource to update
      numResources - how many resources a card gives

    • removeResources

      public void removeResources(Sign sign, Integer numResources)
      this function updates the resources. It subtracts the resources covered by a new card played.
      Parameters:
      sign - the type of resource to update
      numResources - how many resources to delete

    • giveCard

      public void giveCard(ResourceCard card)
      This function deletes the card given by input. The game Master should call this method to eliminate a card, played on table, from player's hand.
      Parameters:
      card - card played

    • takeCard

      public void takeCard(ResourceCard card)
      This function gives to player a new card. The game Master should call this method to give a card to player's hand. The new card will be put in the only position in the array where there is value == null. There is only one null position at every player's round.
      Parameters:
      card - the new card drawn

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints(int new_points)
      this function sums the new points given by a new played card
      Parameters:
      new_points - the points possibly given by a new card or a secret objective

    • addObjectivePoints

      public void addObjectivePoints(int new_points)
      slack professor's comment: Grazie per la segnalazione! Ho cambiato la mia risposta 1 di conseguenza: ci si ferma a 29 punti prima di sommare le carte obiettivo. A questo punto si procede con la somma degli obiettivi a fine partita e si segue la regola alla risposta 3 in caso di parit√† Sums the extra points given by the objectiveCard
      Parameters:
      new_points - special points given at the end of the game by ObjectiveCard

    • getObjectivePoints

      public int getObjectivePoints()
      This method returns the objective points of the player. Objective points are special points that are added at the end of the game based on the player's secret objective card.
      Returns:
      the objective points of the player.

      public void setColour(Color colour)
      This method sets the color of the player's pin.
      Parameters:
      colour - the color to set for the player's pin.
